option.name: change_view
option._long: When the mouse pointer is moved, the view focus changes to the view under the pointer.

option.name: change_output
option._long: When the mouse pointer is moved, the output focus changes to the output that the pointer is currently on.

option.name: focus_delay
option._short: Delay (in ms) before focus change will be triggered
option._long: The delay in ms before the plugin will trigger a focus change after the movement finished.

option.name: threshold
option._long: The distance (x+y) the cursor should be moved at least before the plugin gets activated
